building stuff w/ Rails stuff

10 aug 2014

It is a law of life that problems arise when conditions are there for their solution. ~ Walter Sisulu

I believe that every problem has a solution. I like to create solutions to problems. It is my understadning and has been my experience that software development and engineering allows an individual to accomplish this:

  • without the help of others
  • at scale
  • with the help of others
  • with little to no financial investment
  • for virtually any problem in any domain that can be described

Question ..

What other skillset can claim the same?

Take your time .. I will wait .. Bueller Bueller Bueller
